summary: Forget all the internet’s “controversy” bullshit and just go into Captain Marvel with an open mind and you will not be...
body: Forget all the internet’s “controversy” bullshit and just go into Captain Marvel with an open mind and you will not be disappointed. Anyone can enjoy this movie, as long as they don’t come in with prejudgments and the radical notion that if a movie has a female protagonist it’s suddenly “feminist propaganda”. Why is the internet’s first response always hate?

reblog.comment: Forget all the internet’s “controversy” bullshit and just go into Captain Marvel with an open mind and you will not be disappointed. Anyone can enjoy this movie, as long as they don’t come in with prejudgments and the radical notion that if a movie has a female protagonist it’s suddenly “feminist propaganda”. Why is the internet’s first response always hate?

trail.content_raw: Forget all the internet’s “controversy” bullshit and just go into Captain Marvel with an open mind and you will not be disappointed. Anyone can enjoy this movie, as long as they don’t come in with prejudgments and the radical notion that if a movie has a female protagonist it’s suddenly “feminist propaganda”. Why is the internet’s first response always hate?
trail.content: Forget all the internet’s “controversy” bullshit and just go into Captain Marvel with an open mind and you will not be disappointed. Anyone can enjoy this movie, as long as they don’t come in with prejudgments and the radical notion that if a movie has a female protagonist it’s suddenly “feminist propaganda”. Why is the internet’s first response always hate?

summary:
I wasn't expecting this movie to be this good. Yet IT WAS. 
Great action. Great story. Great humor. 
I'm a dude, and oh boy,...
body:
I wasn’t expecting this movie to be this good. Yet IT WAS.

Great action. Great story. Great humor.

I’m a dude, and oh boy, Carol had me all inspired and cheering for her at the end. Such an amazing hero.

“I’m only a human - I don’t have to prove you anything - I’ll find you a home”

CAROL DANVERS IS HERE TO STAY

P.S.: Literally 10 seconds into the movie and I almost cry. Beautiful intro. Beautiful.

summary: Hope
body:
Hope

My teacher said “In physics nothing is impossible, but highly improbable. Is death impossible to overcome? No, it’s highly unlikely”

This gave me hope for Tony Stark

There’s still hope for Tony Stark

summary: So I watched captain marvel one day before its initial release and the credits were coming on and I expeacted atleast four...
body:
So I watched captain marvel one day before its initial release and the credits were coming on and I expeacted atleast four people to get up before the post credit scene, but no one got up

Do you know how powerful it feels when you’re in a marvel movie and no one gets up before the post credit scenes? no one?

summary:
It's magic, baby - 6 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/PoFAMGTWSU

In a universe where The Avengers are all together and everyone is...
caption: It’s magic, baby - 6 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/PoFAMGTWSU In a universe where The Avengers are all together and everyone is still alive, a new old face comes along. She has created an image for herself and trying to explain who she really is, proves to be quite difficult. Especially when her own brother is Tony Stark. Trying to reshape your image is difficult in the public eye.
